preference.name: ME3DPDFEncodingTypes
preference.preference_description: Generating a 3DPDF Report with Process Simulate data requires the xml files, that are used for the creation, to be set with an encoding type that supports the specific language. The preference contains a list of encoding types, each can support other languages. The 3DPDF Report will be generated using the first value in the list. These are the details of the languages supported by each of the encoding types: * Windows-1252 : French ,German ,Italian, Spanish, Swedish, Scottish, Portuguese, Irish, Dutch, Albanian, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian * Windows-1251 : Russian, Bulgarian, Serbian, Ukranian, Uzbek * GB-2312 : Simplified Chinese * ISO-8859-8 : Hebrew * Windows-1250 : Croatian, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, Transliterated Serbian, Slovak * Shift_JIS : Japanese * EUC-KR : Korean * Big5 : Traditional Chinese
